content:
So an interesting (to me anyway) observation - I just submitted 2 FHIR IGs for ballot this cycle.

And granted, they were small, simple IGs.

But, this was the first cycle where I can say that preparing and submitting the FHIR IG was easier than the same process for a CDA IG.

So thanks everybody (@Grahame Grieve @Lloyd McKenzie @Melva Peters @Lynn Laakso, @Sean McIlvenna etc, etc.) for working so hard on the IG tooling, publishing, balloting code and processes!
Equally so, thanks for your patience while these things have been evolving...
Not sure "patient" would be the right word to describe it, but we'll go with it! :joy:
